description: This file defines a 'Loader' component using LightningJS framework, which displays animated circles for a loading indicator with fade-in and fade-out transitions.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A LightningJS component that shows animated circles as a loading indicator with fade transitions.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initiates a repeating interval that toggles the alpha property to create a pulsating loading animation.
